title: Episode 1
description: They say even your deepest, darkest secrets have a way of coming out at the worst time possible and so in our first ON Station’24 episode, our host Ahmed Siddiqui sets out to engage Fiza and Musa in an enjoyable game of “Spill Your Guts or Fill Your Guts”! But hold on freshmen, your fun-loving seniors are far from done. Ahmed welcomes Saman and Naurang for a round of “Taste Buds” as well! Don’t miss out on who survives the food battle of their lives!

title: Episode 2
description: Cue the drumroll for the wait is over! ON Station is back with another episode featuring Aun, Umer, Mariyam, and Laiba as they unveil NUST's vibrant social life and share exactly what our freshmen should expect from ON'24. So what are you waiting for? Tune in for this incredible episode of 'Aun-Station'! (pun intended)
